1578680.name: RPG Maker MZ - Modern + Outer Basic
1578680.description:
Modern+ Outside Basic contains the basic files from outside of a modern city buildings, focused on residential, suburbs, and commercial areas. This is an expansion of Modern+ collection, and fits with the Modern+ Inner Basic. This pack contains tiles for make outside buildings like: Houses, hotels, gas stations, cafes, parks, buildings, roads and etc.

Contains:

5 Tilesets: Residential tileset, Road tileset, General Commercial stuff and Outdoors tileset.
1 Charset of 4 doors with recolours
1 A5 tileset
1 A4 tileset
1 A2 tileset

Bonus: A bridge tileset.
Bonus: Sideview carset pack included
Bonus: A little shop tiles

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1578680.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
